verses.text_plain: Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me; and, behold, he formed grasshoppers in the beginning of the shooting up of the latter growth; and, lo, it was the latter growth after the king’s mowings.
verses.verse_html:
1Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me; and, behold, he formed grasshoppers in the beginning of the shooting up of the latter growth; and, lo, it was the latter growth after the king’s mowings. ▼
▼ grasshoppers: or, green worms

tokens.text: unto me; and, behold, he formed

footnotes.body_html: ▼ grasshoppers: or, green worms

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, that when they had made an end of eating the grass of the land, then I said, O Lord God, forgive, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small.
verses.verse_html:
2And it came to pass, that when they had made an end of eating the grass of the land, then I said, O Lord God, forgive, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small. ▼
▼ by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?

tokens.text: when they had made an end
I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob

footnotes.body_text: ▼ by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?

verses.text_plain: The Lord repented for this: It shall not be, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 3The Lord repented for this: It shall not be, saith the Lord.

tokens.text: for this: It shall not be, saith

verses.text_plain: Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me: and, behold, the Lord God called to contend by fire, and it devoured the great deep, and did eat up a part.
verses.verse_html: 4Thus hath the Lord God shewed unto me: and, behold, the Lord God called to contend by fire, and it devoured the great deep, and did eat up a part.

tokens.text: unto me: and, behold, the Lord

verses.text_plain: Then said I, O Lord God, cease, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small.
verses.verse_html:
5Then said I, O Lord God, cease, I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob arise? for he is small. ▼
▼ by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?

tokens.text: I beseech thee: by whom shall Jacob

footnotes.body_text: ▼ by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?
footnotes.body_html: ▼ by…: or, who of (or, for,) Jacob shall stand?

verses.text_plain: The Lord repented for this: This also shall not be, saith the Lord God.
verses.verse_html: 6The Lord repented for this: This also shall not be, saith the Lord God.

tokens.text: for this: This also shall not be, saith

verses.text_plain: Thus he shewed me: and, behold, the Lord stood upon a wall made by a plumbline, with a plumbline in his hand.
verses.verse_html: 7Thus he shewed me: and, behold, the Lord stood upon a wall made by a plumbline, with a plumbline in his hand.

verses.text_plain: And the Lord said unto me, Amos, what seest thou? And I said, A plumbline. Then said the Lord, Behold, I will set a plumbline in the midst of my people Israel: I will not again pass by them any more:
verses.verse_html: 8And the Lord said unto me, Amos, what seest thou? And I said, A plumbline. Then said the Lord, Behold, I will set a plumbline in the midst of my people Israel: I will not again pass by them any more:

verses.text_plain: And the high places of Isaac shall be desolate, and the sanctuaries of Israel shall be laid waste; and I will rise against the house of Jeroboam with the sword.
verses.verse_html: 9And the high places of Isaac shall be desolate, and the sanctuaries of Israel shall be laid waste; and I will rise against the house of Jeroboam with the sword.

verses.text_plain: Then Amaziah the priest of Beth–el sent to Jeroboam king of Israel, saying, Amos hath conspired against thee in the midst of the house of Israel: the land is not able to bear all his words.
verses.verse_html: 10Then Amaziah the priest of Beth–el sent to Jeroboam king of Israel, saying, Amos hath conspired against thee in the midst of the house of Israel: the land is not able to bear all his words.

verses.text_plain: For thus Amos saith, Jeroboam shall die by the sword, and Israel shall surely be led away captive out of their own land.
verses.verse_html: 11For thus Amos saith, Jeroboam shall die by the sword, and Israel shall surely be led away captive out of their own land.

verses.text_plain: Also Amaziah said unto Amos, O thou seer, go, flee thee away into the land of Judah, and there eat bread, and prophesy there:
verses.verse_html: 12Also Amaziah said unto Amos, O thou seer, go, flee thee away into the land of Judah, and there eat bread, and prophesy there:

verses.text_plain: But prophesy not again any more at Beth–el: for it is the king’s chapel, and it is the king’s court.
verses.verse_html:
13But prophesy not again any more at Beth–el: for it is the king’s chapel, and it is the king’s court. ▼
▼ chapel: or, sanctuary
 , ▼
▼ king’s court: Heb. house of the kingdom

footnotes.body_text: ▼ king’s court: Heb. house of the kingdom
footnotes.body_html: ▼ king’s court: Heb. house of the kingdom

verses.text_plain: Then answered Amos, and said to Amaziah, I was no prophet, neither was I a prophet’s son; but I was an herdman, and a gatherer of sycomore fruit:
verses.verse_html:
14Then answered Amos, and said to Amaziah, I was no prophet, neither was I a prophet’s son; but I was an herdman, and a gatherer of sycomore fruit: ▼
▼ sycomore…: or, wild figs

footnotes.body_html: ▼ sycomore…: or, wild figs

verses.text_plain: And the Lord took me as I followed the flock, and the Lord said unto me, Go, prophesy unto my people Israel.
verses.verse_html:
15And the Lord took me as I followed the flock, and the Lord said unto me, Go, prophesy unto my people Israel. ▼
▼ as…: Heb. from behind

footnotes.body_html: ▼ as…: Heb. from behind

verses.text_plain: Now therefore hear thou the word of the Lord: Thou sayest, Prophesy not against Israel, and drop not thy word against the house of Isaac.
verses.verse_html: 16Now therefore hear thou the word of the Lord: Thou sayest, Prophesy not against Israel, and drop not thy word against the house of Isaac.

verses.text_plain: Therefore thus saith the Lord; Thy wife shall be an harlot in the city, and thy sons and thy daughters shall fall by the sword, and thy land shall be divided by line; and thou shalt die in a polluted land: and Israel shall surely go into captivity forth of his land.
verses.verse_html: 17Therefore thus saith the Lord; Thy wife shall be an harlot in the city, and thy sons and thy daughters shall fall by the sword, and thy land shall be divided by line; and thou shalt die in a polluted land: and Israel shall surely go into captivity forth of his land.
